long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ExamEye, a groundbreaking Chrome extension developed by the Department of Infocommunication at Corvinus University of Budapest. Tailored for ChatGPT research, ExamEye is designed to meticulously analyze browser usage patterns during test writing. Our primary objective is to investigate whether ChatGPT users exhibit distinct browsing behaviors during examinations.

ExamEye employs a sophisticated method to gather insightful data. It meticulously measures user activity exclusively during examination periods, capturing crucial metrics such as focus intervals, active intervals, and the URLs of opened pages. Additionally, the extension records the text of Google searches and the content of ChatGPT contexts utilized during the testing phase.

By delving into these comprehensive metrics, ExamEye aims to shed light on the nuanced browsing habits of ChatGPT users during exams. This extension serves as a valuable tool in understanding and potentially enhancing the user experience, contributing to the ongoing advancements in ChatGPT research. Download ExamEye today and be a part of the cutting-edge exploration into the intersection of artificial intelligence and user behavior.A
